pullRequest.title: Switch to AmmoType when more specific type is available
pullRequest.bodyText:
This makes use of a Java feature whereby an override can use a more-derived type in a return value. In this case AmmoBin and AmmoStorage only support AmmoType as their EquipmentType, so we reflect that in their constructors and getType overloads.
This has two effects:

The code is more straightforward.
Errors caused by equipment mismatches are at the point of assignment rather than point of usage making tracing easier.

commit.message: Switch to AmmoType when more specific type is available

nodes.bodyText: Formatting looks odd, probably tab spaced.
